title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.22 - Ownership of voting stock by salesmen prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.22 - Ownership of voting stock by salesmen prohibited

State Regulations

No licensed real estate salesman may own, either singly or
jointly, directly or indirectly, any voting shares of stock in any licensed
real estate brokerage corporation with which he is
associated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
